name: ancient european oak tree
description: a huge, ancient tree with greyish-brown, closely grooved bark and oblong, lobed leaves
details: A huge, ancient tree standing tall into the sky with a wide spreading canopy. Its bark is greyish brown, closely groved with vertical plates.  Its leaves are a deep, dark green on top and paler underneath. They are arranged alternately along the twigs, and are broadly oblong with three to six lobes. There are large burrs on the truck, from which many small shoots grow.
